headline: DataConsultant|TransformingBusinesseswithDataSolutions,DataGovernanceandCloud-nativeETLStrategies|HelpingOrganizationsStreamlineDataProcesses|ProvenTrackRecordwithGlobalEnterprises
about:
I am a seasoned Data Consultant with over 16 years of experience in transforming businesses through innovative data solutions and cloud technologies. My career journey has taken me across the globe, working with leading enterprises in diverse industries including telecommunications, aviation, IT services, and consulting.

Career Story:
My passion for data and technology began early in my career, and I have since honed my skills in big data, cloud computing, DevOps, and data governance. My expertise lies in designing and implementing scalable data architectures that drive efficiency and cost savings for my clients.

Key Achievements:
- Danone: Spearheaded a project that improved time-to-market by 70% and reduced environmental costs by 50%.
- Bayer: Developed a global ETL strategy and implemented a comprehensive data governance framework, resulting in significant process improvements and cost optimizations.
- Audley Travel: Modernized their data platform with Data lakehouse capabilities, improving the reporting strategy, facilitating a seamless migration from Dynamics AX to D365.
- GACA: Led a digital transformation initiative that slashed operational expenses by 70% through virtualization and optimized software licensing.

Services Offered
I specialize in:
- Data Strategy and Architecture
- Big Data Analytics
- Data Governance and Compliance
- Cloud Solutions (Azure)
- DevOps and Automation.

headline: CISSP|CISA|InfoSecTrainer|CyberSecurityAnalyst&ISAuditor
about:
As the Senior Programmer of Cybersecurity Cell at Rupali Bank PLC., one of the leading state-owned commercial banks in Bangladesh, I lead the IT security and IS audit Team. With over 17 years of experience, I have developed and implemented various IT policies, strategies, and procedures to safeguard the bank's data assets, as well as support its business objectives and growth.

My core competencies include cybersecurity, incident management, incident investigations, risk management, developing BCP and DRPs, writing policies, processes and procedures, conducting business process reengineering, and IS audit. I often step out of my zone to do what needs to be done to help my organization. My focus always remains to improve protection and performance of the bank's IT infrastructure and systems. 

🟢 I design, develop, and assist the implementation of sound and robust IT security architecture for the entire bank, ensuring compliance with regulatory and international standards.

🟢 I also develop and update the cyber security policy, implementation guideline, business continuity plan, and disaster recovery plan for the bank, as well as investigate and resolve any security incidents or vulnerabilities. 

🎓Educational Portfolio:
→ 📚 M.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering
→ 📚 Commonwealth Executive MBA (CEMBA)
→ 📚 Diploma Associate of the Institute of Bankers, Bangladesh (DAIBB)
→ 📚 B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering

📚 I have multiple certifications, including 
 → 🔰 Certified Information Systems Security Professionals (CISSP), 
 → 🔰 Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA),
 → 🔰 Certified Data Centre Professional (CDCP), 
 → 🔰 Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)
 → 🔰 Certified Ethical Hacking (CEH)

I am passionate about enhancing the information security of existing operational processes and delivering value to the organizational stakeholders.
